##Structure of Data

The original"Zumper-Apartment-West End Vancouver" dataset consists of 11 variables. All of these variables are scraped from www.Zumper.com filtered for West End Vancouver location. Over 117 posts are collected. 


```{r}

str(Zumper_with_outliers)

```

##Cleanning Data

Due to a few number of data, cleaning process was done by Excel.

##Indentify outlier values

There are some outlier values for the studio type, so these values will be removed


```{r}

ggplot(Zumper_with_outliers, aes(Room,Price))+ geom_boxplot()
```

## Remove outliers

After the validation and cleaning, the data has 115 rows and 11 columns.

```{r}
ggplot(Zumper, aes(Room,Price))+ geom_boxplot()

```
